tool_description: Discover where to stream movies and shows globally with SafeVideo Streaming Options API—your resource for title availability, regional options, and provider details.
name: streaming-options
title: streaming-options

api_list.name: Get by ID
api_list.description: Fetch streaming locations, pricing, and quality for titles using IMDb or TMDb IDs.

optional_parameters.name: imdb_id
optional_parameters.description: IMDb ID of the target show. either `imdb_id` or `tmdb_id` is required

optional_parameters.name: tmdb_id
optional_parameters.description: TMDb ID of the target show. either  `tmdb_id` or `imdb_id` is required

api_list.name: Regions
api_list.description: List all supported regions, enhancing app localization.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://streaming-options1.p.rapidapi.com/watch/regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "streaming-options1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Providers
api_list.description: Access detailed info on streaming providers, including names and service types.
